definitions.explanation_en: A masculine given name, commonly used as a diminutive or informal form of the name David.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个男性名，通常作为名字 David 的昵称或非正式形式。
definitions.example_en: Dave is the team leader who always keeps everyone motivated.
definitions.example_cn: 戴夫是那个总能激励大家的团队领导。
